TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SmtpException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when the is not able to complete a or operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property contains the status code returned by the SMTP server.
## Examples The following code example displays an error message when the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: A that describes the error that occurred.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message and inner exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`.
